backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with access control, user profiles, and admin‑restricted CRUD operations for content entries using Maps and mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no‑op migration module that maps old actor state structures directly to the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected frontend files and components for updating admin works data fetching.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base body styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template that mounts the React app at the root element and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the full TanStack Router route tree, global layout, theming, and admin‑guarded admin routes.
Route guard that checks identity and admin status, showing tailored alerts for missing login, incomplete setup, or insufficient privileges.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with React Query cache clearing and error handling for already‑authenticated states.
frontend/src/components/content/EntryLis: Displays a grid of entry cards with titles, dates, excerpts, and tags, linking to detailed views. Handles empty states and formats timestamps.
frontend/src/components/content/Prose.ts: Wraps content with standardized prose styling using utility classes and optional extra class names.
frontend/src/components/feedback/QuerySt: Provides loading skeletons, error alerts, and empty-state messaging for query-driven components.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with navigation links, copyright text, and a powered-by attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Implements the main site header with navigation, search, login, mobile menu, and optional admin link logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the page layout structure including header, footer, and main content wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralizes React Query cache keys for entries, search, auth, and works.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminEntries.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, deleting, and publishing entries with query invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminWorks.ts: Supplies admin-focused queries and mutations for managing works, including upload, update, delete, and publish actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Checks whether the current caller is an admin using the backend actor and exposes related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch published entries by section and individual entries via an actor, with sorting and conditional enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider that manages identities, login flow, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useRobustActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to the user's identity, handling admin token setup and auto‑invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearch.ts: Supplies a search hook that queries entries by term, optionally filters by section, and sorts results by creation date.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorks.ts: Provides hooks to fetch published works and individual work details through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm light/dark theme palette using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page describing the platform’s mission and content sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard listing entries by section with controls to edit, publish/unpublish, and delete entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditorPage: Admin form for creating or editing an entry, handling sections, text fields, tags, and admin access validation.
Admin page listing works with controls to upload, publish/unpublish, and delete items using admin mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWorkUpload: Admin page for uploading a new work file with progress tracking, metadata inputs, and admin access checks.
frontend/src/pages/EntryDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single entry with title, date, tags, and HTML body, using routing and query state handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with links to main content sections and a styled hero background.
frontend/src/pages/IntroductionPage.tsx: Presents an introduction page about the author and their literary focus and works.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a search UI allowing users to query entries with optional section filtering and displays results with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SectionListPage.tsx: Shows published entries for a given section with tag filtering, loading/error handling, and a list view.
frontend/src/pages/WorkDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single work, including metadata and an embedded PDF viewer with download support.
frontend/src/pages/WorksListPage.tsx: Lists all published works with metadata and provides view or download actions depending on file type.
frontend/src/utils/authErrorMessages.ts: Normalizes authorization errors into friendly admin-access messages and provides a helper to format error texts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL or hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, fonts, radius, shadows, and animations for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, architecture notes, and known issues around admin authorization and work uploads.
